list.name: Changes
list.comment:
refactor: Enhance and refactor service and UI templates
Refactored and enhanced several core service and UI component templates.
- **`CustomButton`**: Reworked to support multiple styles (`filled`, `outline`, `text`, `icon`) and added extensive customization options including loading states, icons, and gradients. - **`TextStyleUtil`**: Improved with a `FontWeightType` enum, responsive text styles (`ksp`), and enhanced `AppText` extension methods. - **`SnackbarHelper`**: Created an advanced snackbar utility with predefined types (success, error, etc.) and custom configurations. - **`HexColor`**: Enhanced to support more hex formats, added validation, error handling, and helper methods like `lighter` and `darker`. - **`ColorUtil`**: Refactored into `ColorUtil` extension and a static `AppColors` class for better theme integration and color constant management. - **`CommonImageView`**: Significantly improved to auto-detect image types (network, file, SVG, asset) from a single `imagePath`, with better placeholders and error handling. - **`ResponsiveSize`**: Expanded with more helpers for padding and creating `SizedBox` widgets. - **`VersionK`**: Refactored into a singleton with improved dialog UI and logic for mandatory updates. - **`Chats` & `ChatScreen` Modules**: Updated controllers with models, state management, and bindings with `fenix: true`. Reworked `ChatsView` for a modern look and feel. - **`ImageConstant`**: Updated to provide a more structured way of managing image assets.

task.summary:
feat: Implement advanced architecture and services
Introduced a comprehensive set of templates for a production-ready, clean architecture.
- Added `dio_template` for a robust networking layer, including: - `DioClient` singleton and `APIManager`. - `RemoteDataSource`, `LocalDataSource`, and `Repository` patterns. - `ApiResponse` model for standardized responses. - Interceptors for auth, logging, rate-limiting, and retries. - Network connectivity monitoring, request queuing, and mock data sources. - Detailed `ARCHITECTURE.md` and `README.md` documentation.
- Added `services_template` with utility classes: - `DateFormatter` for various date/time operations. - `Validators` for input validation (email, password, etc.). - `DialogHelper` with enhanced loading and confirmation dialogs. - `GetStorageService` with encrypted storage and improved data management. - `Enigma` encryption service with better error handling and structure.
- Enhanced `main.dart` with structured initialization, error handling, and environment configuration. - Improved `CommonImageView` to support file, SVG, network, and asset images with better placeholders and error handling. - Refactored `auth.dart` into a full-fledged service with comprehensive methods for Google, Apple, email/password, and phone auth, including robust error handling and a structured `AuthResult` model. - Updated `ChatScreenController` with a `ChatMessage` model and advanced state management for sending, loading, and deleting messages.

refactor: Enhance and refactor service and UI templates
Refactored and enhanced several core service and UI component templates.
- **`CustomButton`**: Reworked to support multiple styles (`filled`, `outline`, `text`, `icon`) and added extensive customization options including loading states, icons, and gradients. - **`TextStyleUtil`**: Improved with a `FontWeightType` enum, responsive text styles (`ksp`), and enhanced `AppText` extension methods. - **`SnackbarHelper`**: Created an advanced snackbar utility with predefined types (success, error, etc.) and custom configurations. - **`HexColor`**: Enhanced to support more hex formats, added validation, error handling, and helper methods like `lighter` and `darker`. - **`ColorUtil`**: Refactored into `ColorUtil` extension and a static `AppColors` class for better theme integration and color constant management. - **`CommonImageView`**: Significantly improved to auto-detect image types (network, file, SVG, asset) from a single `imagePath`, with better placeholders and error handling. - **`ResponsiveSize`**: Expanded with more helpers for padding and creating `SizedBox` widgets. - **`VersionK`**: Refactored into a singleton with improved dialog UI and logic for mandatory updates. - **`Chats` & `ChatScreen` Modules**: Updated controllers with models, state management, and bindings with `fenix: true`. Reworked `ChatsView` for a modern look and feel. - **`ImageConstant`**: Updated to provide a more structured way of managing image assets.

refactor: Enhance and refactor service and UI templates
Refactored and enhanced several core service and UI component templates.
- **`CustomButton`**: Reworked to support multiple styles (`filled`, `outline`, `text`, `icon`) and added extensive customization options including loading states, icons, and gradients. - **`TextStyleUtil`**: Improved with a `FontWeightType` enum, responsive text styles (`ksp`), and enhanced `AppText` extension methods. - **`SnackbarHelper`**: Created an advanced snackbar utility with predefined types (success, error, etc.) and custom configurations. - **`HexColor`**: Enhanced to support more hex formats, added validation, error handling, and helper methods like `lighter` and `darker`. - **`ColorUtil`**: Refactored into `ColorUtil` extension and a static `AppColors` class for better theme integration and color constant management. - **`CommonImageView`**: Significantly improved to auto-detect image types (network, file, SVG, asset) from a single `imagePath`, with better placeholders and error handling. - **`ResponsiveSize`**: Expanded with more helpers for padding and creating `SizedBox` widgets. - **`VersionK`**: Refactored into a singleton with improved dialog UI and logic for mandatory updates. - **`Chats` & `ChatScreen` Modules**: Updated controllers with models, state management, and bindings with `fenix: true`. Reworked `ChatsView` for a modern look and feel. - **`ImageConstant`**: Updated to provide a more structured way of managing image assets.

MESSAGE.value:
feat: Implement advanced architecture and services
Introduced a comprehensive set of templates for a production-ready, clean architecture.
- Added `dio_template` for a robust networking layer, including: - `DioClient` singleton and `APIManager`. - `RemoteDataSource`, `LocalDataSource`, and `Repository` patterns. - `ApiResponse` model for standardized responses. - Interceptors for auth, logging, rate-limiting, and retries. - Network connectivity monitoring, request queuing, and mock data sources. - Detailed `ARCHITECTURE.md` and `README.md` documentation.
- Added `services_template` with utility classes: - `DateFormatter` for various date/time operations. - `Validators` for input validation (email, password, etc.). - `DialogHelper` with enhanced loading and confirmation dialogs. - `GetStorageService` with encrypted storage and improved data management. - `Enigma` encryption service with better error handling and structure.
- Enhanced `main.dart` with structured initialization, error handling, and environment configuration. - Improved `CommonImageView` to support file, SVG, network, and asset images with better placeholders and error handling. - Refactored `auth.dart` into a full-fledged service with comprehensive methods for Google, Apple, email/password, and phone auth, including robust error handling and a structured `AuthResult` model. - Updated `ChatScreenController` with a `ChatMessage` model and advanced state management for sending, loading, and deleting messages.

refactor: Enhance and refactor service and UI templates
Refactored and enhanced several core service and UI component templates.
- **`CustomButton`**: Reworked to support multiple styles (`filled`, `outline`, `text`, `icon`) and added extensive customization options including loading states, icons, and gradients. - **`TextStyleUtil`**: Improved with a `FontWeightType` enum, responsive text styles (`ksp`), and enhanced `AppText` extension methods. - **`SnackbarHelper`**: Created an advanced snackbar utility with predefined types (success, error, etc.) and custom configurations. - **`HexColor`**: Enhanced to support more hex formats, added validation, error handling, and helper methods like `lighter` and `darker`. - **`ColorUtil`**: Refactored into `ColorUtil` extension and a static `AppColors` class for better theme integration and color constant management. - **`CommonImageView`**: Significantly improved to auto-detect image types (network, file, SVG, asset) from a single `imagePath`, with better placeholders and error handling. - **`ResponsiveSize`**: Expanded with more helpers for padding and creating `SizedBox` widgets. - **`VersionK`**: Refactored into a singleton with improved dialog UI and logic for mandatory updates. - **`Chats` & `ChatScreen` Modules**: Updated controllers with models, state management, and bindings with `fenix: true`. Reworked `ChatsView` for a modern look and feel. - **`ImageConstant`**: Updated to provide a more structured way of managing image assets.

option.value:
refactor: Enhance and refactor service and UI templates
Refactored and enhanced several core service and UI component templates.
- **`CustomButton`**: Reworked to support multiple styles (`filled`, `outline`, `text`, `icon`) and added extensive customization options including loading states, icons, and gradients. - **`TextStyleUtil`**: Improved with a `FontWeightType` enum, responsive text styles (`ksp`), and enhanced `AppText` extension methods. - **`SnackbarHelper`**: Created an advanced snackbar utility with predefined types (success, error, etc.) and custom configurations. - **`HexColor`**: Enhanced to support more hex formats, added validation, error handling, and helper methods like `lighter` and `darker`. - **`ColorUtil`**: Refactored into `ColorUtil` extension and a static `AppColors` class for better theme integration and color constant management. - **`CommonImageView`**: Significantly improved to auto-detect image types (network, file, SVG, asset) from a single `imagePath`, with better placeholders and error handling. - **`ResponsiveSize`**: Expanded with more helpers for padding and creating `SizedBox` widgets. - **`VersionK`**: Refactored into a singleton with improved dialog UI and logic for mandatory updates. - **`Chats` & `ChatScreen` Modules**: Updated controllers with models, state management, and bindings with `fenix: true`. Reworked `ChatsView` for a modern look and feel. - **`ImageConstant`**: Updated to provide a more structured way of managing image assets.
